column4: hey, does anybody know how to change it so link extentions will show and i can change them?
this file of mine i downloaded somehow turned into a link, and i can't change it back and i can't access the file
yes, go to an explorer window, then one of the menus lets you get into 'folder options' (I think).  It's in there, called "hide extensions for known types"
hit windows-r then type "cmd" and hit return.  you'll be in a 'shell' window (such as it is) where you can 'cd' to the directory and "rename" the file
what does it say if you just run "rename" without arguments?  Or "rename/?"?
